column4: (She giggles.)
(She opens her mouth wide and allows you to silence her easily.)
(You remove her gag as she smiles at you.)  Gags are so much fun Madam.
(She seems curious as you push the earplugs in.)  You will need to talk louder Madam.
(You pull the earplugs out.) The silence was heightening my other senses.
(She turns around submissively while you restrain her arms.)  This therapy is very kinky.
(You free her arms as she stretches.)  I hope my treatment isn't already complete.
(She gives you her hands to be restrained.)  No more touching for me it seems.
(You release her hands as she nods slowly.)  Thank you Madam.
(She stands still as you restrain her legs.)  I wasn't planning on running away.
(You release her legs as she rocks her hips.)  Best therapy ever!
(She laughs as you restrain her feet.)  It tickles!
(You release her feet and she jumps playfully.)  I love being a patient here.
(You strap the device on her head as she tries to look around.)  This is scary, but I guess it's for my own good.
(You remove the device and she looks at you.)  That was freaky, maybe we should try other types of items.
(She cowers from the pain as you whip her breast.)  Oooww, Madam!  Isn't it a little harsh?
(You swing the crop on her breast as she whimpers.)  I beg you Madam!  I'll try to be a better patient.
(You whip her butt hard as she jumps from the pain.)  Fuck it hurts!  Oops!  Sorry I said that word.
(She tries to avoid the crop as you swing it on her butt.)  Oh please!  It's really painful.
(She barely seems to notice that you're there.)
Hello nurse DialogPlayerName, are you here for my bondage treatment?
Hello Madam, I hope you're having fun in the asylum.
(She bows her head.)  I'm patient DialogCharacterName, pleased to meet you Madam.
Mistress sent me here for a bondage therapy.  So long story short, I'm in therapy.
(She shakes her head yes.)  Of course nurse DialogPlayerName, it's part of my treatment.
(She shakes her head yes.)  Yes Madam, it's part of my treatment.
(She shakes her head yes.)  Absolutely.  Mistress said that I belong to the asylum until she gets me back.
